title: Superior Darkvision

Deep Gnome, Drow, Duergar, Gloom Stalker, Warlock (Devil's Sight Eldritch Invocation), Shadow Magic

Superior Darkvision Tips & Notes

When acquired through Ranger (Gloom Stalker), your Darkvision will become 24m, regardless of the level of Darkvision you had previously. This will also give you an advantage in combat when you are in dark areas such as caves, as you will have a higher chance of hitting enemies. As opposed to other
